products.title: Fokus Hydration Pack of 3
products.description: Experience all three signature flavors of Fokus Hydration in one convenient combo—an ideal way to discover your favorite or enjoy a new taste every day!.

ingredients.name: Vitamin D3
ingredients.description: Lack of sunshine got your vibe down? Vitamin D3 steps in as your mood booster and immune system’s best friend. It’s like a sip of sunlight—strong bones, strong vibes.

ingredients.name: Water
ingredients.description: Pure water is the OG fuel for your body and brain, keeping you cool, calm, and collected—even on chaotic days.

ingredients.name: Coconut Water (22%)
ingredients.description: Coconut water is nature’s hydration hack, packed with electrolytes to keep you refreshed and keep going.

ingredients.name: Sucralose
ingredients.description: Sucralose brings the flavor, skips the calories, and keeps you on track. It’s your sweet fix, made smarter.

ingredients.name: Taurine
ingredients.description: Taurine is the energy ninja that steps in to keep you focused and energized. Whether it’s work or play, this is the endurance boost you need.

ingredients.name: Ginseng Extract
ingredients.description: Ginseng is your go-to for a natural boost. It powers up your focus and keeps you moving, no matter how long the day.

ingredients.name: Ginkgo Biloba Extract
ingredients.description: Ginkgo Biloba clears the mental clutter, improving focus and memory so you’re always on top of your game.

ingredients.name: Creatine
ingredients.description: Creatine powers up your strength and recovery, turning your workouts into beast mode. Push harder, recover faster, and keep leveling up.

ingredients.name: Glutamine
ingredients.description: Glutamine restores your energy like a pro and keeps your muscles and immunity in the game. Built for the grind.

ingredients.name: LCLT (L-Carnitine L-Tartrate)
ingredients.description: LCLT helps convert fat into fuel, giving you long-lasting energy and a metabolic edge.

ingredients.name: 5-HTP
ingredients.description: 5-HTP restores balance, boosting serotonin levels to help you stay calm, happy, and in control.

ingredients.name: Inositol
ingredients.description: Inositol helps calm the overthinking and clears up your headspace. A relaxed mind ready to crush the day.

products.title: Fokus Hydration - Strawberry Watermelon
products.description: A mellow and subtly sweet blend that captures summer in a bottle. The delicate taste of strawberry harmonizes with crisp watermelon, offering a light and truly refreshing flavour ideal for cooling off while staying nourished and focused

products.title: Fokus Hydration - Kiwi Lemon
products.description: A tangy, citrus‑fresh fusion that pairs the bright zing of lemon with the unique sweetness of ripe kiwi. Energizing yet light, it's packed with electrolytes to replenish your body with every sip. Ideal for those seeking a refreshing, clean taste with a hydrating punch.

products.title: Fokus Hydration - Mango Pineapple
products.description: Exotic and tropical, this flavour marries the succulent sweetness of mango with juicy pineapple. It balances tropical fruitiness with the functional benefits of coconut water and ginseng, giving a juicy, revitalizing experience that supports both hydration and recovery.
